title: Refresh Skyra header branding and metro/buildings/facades/furniture imagery

requirements.summary: Update the top nav brand area to show “Skyra” text (no logo image) while keeping smooth scroll-to-top on click.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/TopNav.tsx`, the logo `` is removed from the navbar brand lockup.
The navbar brand area visibly shows the text “Skyra” on the upper-left on all screen sizes.
Clicking the brand area still scrolls the page to the top smoothly.

file_operations.description: Replace the current brand lockup that includes `/assets/generated/skyra-logo.dim_512x512.png` with a text-only “Skyra” treatment, and keep the existing button click handler that smoothly scrolls to the top.

requirements.summary: Replace the hero background overlay image with the new outdoor metro station tiles photo, preserving readability in light/dark modes.
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/HeroSection.tsx`, the background overlay image no longer uses `/assets/generated/skyra-tiles-pattern.dim_1600x900.png` and uses the new generated metro-station image instead.
The hero section still renders correctly in light/dark modes with legible text over the new background image.

file_operations.description: Update the hero overlay image source to use `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-hero-metro-station.dim_1600x900.png` instead of `/assets/generated/skyra-tiles-pattern.dim_1600x900.png`, while keeping the existing overlay/opacity structure so text remains legible in light/dark themes.

requirements.summary: Update Applications section card images so each specified category uses its own distinct new photo (no shared tiles pattern).
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/components/skyra/ApplicationsSection.tsx`, the “Metro & Railway Stations” card image is updated to the new outdoor metro station tiles photo.

In `frontend/src/components/skyra/ApplicationsSection.tsx`, the “Public Buildings”, “Walls & Facades”, and “Urban Furniture” card images are updated to three distinct new images (not `/assets/generated/skyra-tiles-pattern.dim_1600x900.png`).
All application card images render without layout shifts and keep the same aspect ratio and hover behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the applications data to reference the new generated images: set “Metro & Railway Stations” to `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-metro-outdoor.dim_1400x900.png`, “Public Buildings” to `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-public-buildings.dim_1400x900.png`, “Walls & Facades” to `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-walls-facades.dim_1400x900.png`, and “Urban Furniture” to `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-urban-furniture.dim_1400x900.png`, preserving the existing aspect ratio and hover scaling classes.

requirements.summary: Add the new generated images under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and reference them directly from React components.
acceptanceCriteria: All new images are present under `frontend/public/assets/generated` with the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
The hero and applications sections load the new images via `/assets/generated/...` paths.

file_operations.description: Add the generated image asset file: `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-hero-metro-station.dim_1600x900.png`.
Add the generated image asset file: `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-metro-outdoor.dim_1400x900.png`.
Add the generated image asset file: `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-public-buildings.dim_1400x900.png`.
Add the generated image asset file: `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-walls-facades.dim_1400x900.png`.
Add the generated image asset file: `frontend/public/assets/generated/skyra-application-urban-furniture.dim_1400x900.png`.
